verses.verse: The word<WH1697> that Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> spoke<WH1696> to Baruch<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Neriah,<WH5374> when he had written<WH3789> these<WH428> words<WH1697> in a book<WH5612> at the mouth<WH6310> of Jeremiah,<WH3414> in the fourth<WH7243> year<WH8141> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> saying,<WH559>
Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> to you, O Baruch:<WH1263>

You did say,<WH559> Woe<WH188> is me now!<WH4994> for the LORD<WH3068> has added<WH3254> grief<WH3015> to my sorrow;<WH4341> I fainted<WH3021> in my sighing,<WH585> and I find<WH4672> no<WH3808> rest.<WH4496>

Thus<WH3541> shall you say<WH559> to him, The LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> thus;<WH3541> Behold,<WH2009> that which<WH834> I have built<WH1129> will I break<WH2040> down,<WH2040> and that which<WH834> I have planted<WH5193> I will pluck<WH5428> up, even this<WH1931> whole<WH3605> land.<WH776>

And seek<WH1245> you great<WH1419> things for yourself? seek<WH1245> them not: for, behold,<WH2005> I will bring<WH935> evil<WH7451> on all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> said<WH5002> the LORD:<WH3068> but your life<WH5315> will I give<WH5414> to you for a prey<WH7998> in all<WH3605> places<WH4725> where<WH834> <WH8033> you go.<WH3212>
